Containers.Name: iSCSI-Target
Containers.Description: This Plugin will install all necessary software and dependencies for iSCSI, on the bottom of the settings page will be also the utility to configure your iSCSI Targets (the configuration utility is still in beta and will not affect the functionallity of the iSCSI Targets itself). ATTENTION: If you have installed any Python package through the NerdPack uninstall them first! Python will be installed with this plugin.
